children.comment: That makes a lot of sense
I heard somewhere that a lot of early cartoon characters wore gloves because hands were difficult to draw.
about, and a nice little bit of unintentional symbolism in any case. (3/3

random unfounded theory: lots of early animators wanted to disguise the nature of their art and make the public think it was magic. (1/3)
